title: In historic crisis, 2 million people have fled Ukraine since the start of Russian invasion, U.N. says
content:
1. In historic crisis, 2 million people have fled Ukraine since the start of Russian invasion, U.N. says  The Washington Post
  2. Ukraine refugees fleeing Russian invasion reaches 2 million, UN says  Fox News
  3. Outflow of refugees from Ukraine reaches 2 million, says UN refugee chief  CNN
  4. Around 1 million Ukrainian refugees have arrived in Poland amid Russian invasion  CBS News
  5. Tuesday briefing: Biggest refugee crisis in Europe since second world war  The Guardian
contentSnippet:
In historic crisis, 2 million people have fled Ukraine since the start of Russian invasion, U.N. says  The Washington Post
Ukraine refugees fleeing Russian invasion reaches 2 million, UN says  Fox News
Outflow of refugees from Ukraine reaches 2 million, says UN refugee chief  CNN
Around 1 million Ukrainian refugees have arrived in Poland amid Russian invasion  CBS News
Tuesday briefing: Biggest refugee crisis in Europe since second world war  The Guardian

localize.title: 歴史的な危機で、ロシアの侵攻開始以来200万人がウクライナから脱出、国連が発表
联合国表示，在历史性危机中，自俄罗斯入侵开始以来，已有200万人逃离乌克兰。
聯合國表示，在歷史性危機中，自俄羅斯入侵開始以來，已有200萬人逃離烏克蘭。
